meanings.definition: Having the ability to find quick and clever ways to overcome difficulties.
meanings.sent1: She is very resourceful and always finds creative solutions to problems.
meanings.sent2: The resourceful explorer used his skills to navigate through the dense jungle.
meanings.sent3: The resourceful squirrel managed to outsmart the bird and protect its acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her resourceful mind was like a treasure chest full of innovative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The resourceful detective pieced together clues to solve the mystery.

meanings.definition: Able to deal skillfully and promptly with new situations or difficulties.
meanings.sent1: He proved to be resourceful in handling the unexpected changes at work.
meanings.sent2: The resourceful chef quickly adapted to the missing ingredient and created a delicious dish.
meanings.sent3: The resourceful student managed to finish the project despite the power outage.
meanings.sent4: Her resourceful approach to budgeting saved her a lot of money in the long run.
meanings.sent5: The resourceful firefighter rescued the cat from the burning building with ease.
